Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, very worn, the fabric is grey-black in section, the interior is partially covered with a glossy dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a brown slip and slight traces of three lines of black-painted text. A small disassociated fragment constitutes part of this object.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394836) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394836)
